actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974 (20 U.S.C. 1232g) to provide access to limited information, and for other purposes.
short_title: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act

summary.text: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Amendments - Amends the General Education Provisions Act to delete the name of a student from the definition of directory information which may be released without a student's consent. Authorizes educational institutions to release names of students to an individual or organization without a student's consent provided that such requests designate whole class membership rolls of students at the same chronological level of progression, or graduates of a particular year.

titles.title: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act
A bill to amend the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974 (20 U.S.C. 1232g) to provide access to limited information, and for other purposes.
